activities.name: Pike Place Market
activities.description: Start your trip with a visit to Pike Place Market. Enjoy the lively atmosphere, watch the famous fish toss, and browse through the various stalls offering fresh produce, seafood, and artisanal goods. Don't forget to visit the original Starbucks store located nearby.

activities.name: Seattle Aquarium
activities.description: Head to the Seattle Aquarium located on the waterfront. It’s a great place to learn about the marine life of the Pacific Northwest. Enjoy interactive exhibits and see animals such as sea otters, octopuses, and seals.

activities.name: Seattle Great Wheel
activities.description: Take a ride on the Seattle Great Wheel for stunning views of the city and Elliott Bay. It’s especially beautiful at sunset.

activities.name: Dinner at a Waterfront Restaurant
activities.description: End your day with dinner at one of the many waterfront restaurants. Consider dining at Elliott’s Oyster House for some delicious seafood.

activities.name: Hiking in Discovery Park
activities.description: Start your day with a hike in Discovery Park, the largest park in Seattle. Enjoy scenic views of Puget Sound, explore the forested trails, and visit the historic lighthouse.

activities.name: Kayaking on Lake Union
activities.description: Rent a kayak and explore Lake Union. Paddle past houseboats, enjoy views of the city skyline, and watch seaplanes take off and land.

activities.name: Gas Works Park
activities.description: Visit Gas Works Park, a former gasification plant turned park. Enjoy a picnic, fly a kite, and take in panoramic views of the city.

activities.name: Dinner in Fremont
activities.description: Head to the quirky neighborhood of Fremont for dinner. Try local favorites like Paseo Caribbean Restaurant or Revel for a unique dining experience.

activities.name: Chihuly Garden and Glass
activities.description: Start your day at Chihuly Garden and Glass, a museum showcasing the stunning glass art of Dale Chihuly. Marvel at the intricate sculptures and vibrant colors.

activities.name: Museum of Pop Culture
activities.description: Visit the Museum of Pop Culture (MoPOP) to explore exhibits on music, science fiction, and pop culture. Don’t miss the interactive Sound Lab and the iconic Guitar Gallery.

activities.name: Space Needle
activities.description: End your trip with a visit to the iconic Space Needle. Take the elevator to the observation deck for panoramic views of the city and surrounding mountains.

activities.name: Dinner in Capitol Hill
activities.description: Head to Capitol Hill for dinner at one of the trendy restaurants. Consider dining at Terra Plata for farm-to-table cuisine or Ba Bar for Vietnamese street food.
